plugin-data.name: Chuck Norris Quotes
plugin-data.description: This plugin provides random Chuck Norris quotes for your Bludit site.

help-interval: How often the quote should be refreshed
help-requesturi: The full address for requesting a new quote, without parameters
The full address for requesting a list of available categories, without parameters
help-category: From which category a quote should be requested
usage-help: Simply put [chucknorrisquote], [chucknorrisquote][/chucknorrisquote], or [chucknorrisquote/] somewhere in a page's content. You may, of course, surround the tag by HTML to change the appearance of the quote.
quote-disclaimer: Please note that some quotes may contain offensive language. The plugin author assumes no responsibility for the content of these quotes.
quote-sponsor: If you like the service provided by, for example, api.chucknorris.io, you may want to consider sponsoring them.
